channel.title: Pk Fast Spawn | Login & PK | Pk Tickets | 24/7 Online
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.pkfast.com/images/tf_ideal/misc/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=3][COLOR=SandyBrown][B][I]Hi everyone, Pk Fast here, I just wanna wish everyone out there the best. I hope you like pking and having fun.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR=Orange][SIZE=5]Play now at:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Green][URL=http://www.pkfast.com/][COLOR=Green][SIZE=4]www.pkfast.com[/SIZE][/COLOR][/URL][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[COLOR=Orange][SIZE=4][B]Download:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] The desktop client can be downloaded from our website: [URL=http://www.pkfast.com/cmps_index.php?pageid=DownloadClient][SIZE=3][COLOR=Green]Download Now[/COLOR][/SIZE][/URL]
[COLOR=Orange][SIZE=4][B]Features:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[*]Login, chose between various classes, including: Master, Pure, Tanker, Zerker, etc... [*]::item, ::spawn. ([COLOR=Red]not everything's spawnable..[/COLOR]). [*]Flawless Pk ticket system, very very hard to bypass it. [*]Various Pk ticket shop, including barrows armor. [*]Fully working Full Screen, Resizeable and Fixed. [*]Test your skills before going Pking at ::funpk. [*]Fully working summoning skill + summoning familiar. [*]Hosted on a dedicated server - online 24/7 [*]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations [*]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players [*]Several minigames, including Dh FFA, barrows, jad and much more. [*]Regular content updates. [*]19 skills fully working - including fishing, cooking, slayer, crafting, herblore, mining, smithing, fletching and woodcutting for skillers. [*]And much more!!.
[COLOR=Orange][SIZE=4][B]Media:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Blue]Home:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/9691/homefs1.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]Starter Interface:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/4200/starterfs.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]How To Play:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/5043/howtoplayfs.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]Spawn Menu if you don't wanna type ::item manually.[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/3904/menufsb.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]Pk:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/4843/pk3i.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]Pk:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/9560/pkfs.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]Get your whip and dbows:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4073/shipg.png[/img] [COLOR=Blue]Summoning:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/8272/sum1fs.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=Green]Start your adventure today:[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR=Orange][SIZE=3]Play now at:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Green][URL=http://www.pkfast.com/][COLOR=Green][SIZE=4]www.pkfast.com[/SIZE][/COLOR][/URL][/COLOR]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=Green]Comments, questions, or constructive criticism?:[/COLOR][/SIZE] Feel free to post them in this thread and we'll do our best to help you out!

item.title: Pk Fast Spawn | Login & PK | Pk Tickets | 24/7 Online
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“gomomo111, post:6, topic:449865”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=552760.msg4071448#msg4071448 date=1344387982]

[COLOR=Blue]Get your whip and dbows:[/COLOR]

Read the chat box. Doesn’t make me want to play.
[/quote]
It would be really boring if you could get anything for free, game wouldn’t make sense.[/quote]

Well then the title is misleading.

I played this several months ago and you can’t even spawn a whip nor dds If I’m correct, you just see kids who donated running around in Vesta’s attacking regular players with rune / d scim.

Read full topic

[CENTER]

[]Login, chose between various classes, including: Master, Pure, Tanker, Zerker, etc…
[]::item, ::spawn. ([COLOR=Red]not everything’s spawnable…[/COLOR]).
[]Flawless Pk ticket system, very very hard to bypass it.
[]Various Pk ticket shop, including barrows armor.
[]Fully working Full Screen, Resizeable and Fixed.
[]Test your skills before going Pking at ::funpk.
[]Fully working summoning skill + summoning familiar.
[]Hosted on a dedicated server - online 24/7
[]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations
[]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players
[]Several minigames, including Dh FFA, barrows, jad and much more.
[]Regular content updates.
[]19 skills fully working - including fishing, cooking, slayer, crafting, herblore, mining, smithing, fletching and woodcutting for skillers.
[]And much more!!.
